item.title: Augmented Outside-In Discovery with Claude Code
item.description: In a previous article available below, I walked through a structured approach to exploring new codebases.An Outside-In Approach to Discover Unknown CodebasesJumping into a new codebase is never easy. It takes time, patience, and often a fair bit of frustration. And when the codebase is legacy â€” undocumented, Link to article: https://goatreview.com/augmented-outside-discovery-claude-code/
